languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт озабоченно качает головой, глядя на предмет в ваших руках.{/n} "Избавься от него, элантах. Сие творение — плод древних и искаженных разумов, искушающих слабых обещанием вечной юности и бесконечной жизни. Цена, которую надо заплатить... ты видел{mf||а} сам{mf||а}".

{n}Yrliet looks at the object in your hands and shakes her head with concern.{/n} "Get rid of it, elantach. This creation is the fruit of ancient and twisted minds that tempt the weak with the promise of eternal youth and life unending. You have seen the price it exacts with your own eyes."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт озабоченно качает головой, глядя на предмет в ваших руках.{/n} "Избавься от него, элантах. Сие творение — плод древних и искаженных разумов, искушающих слабых обещанием вечной юности и бесконечной жизни. Цена, которую надо заплатить... ты видел{mf||а} сам{mf||а}".

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特看着你手里的东西，关切地摇了摇头。{/n}“快把它丢掉，外界人。这件造物的创造者是某种古老而扭曲的思想，它会以永恒的青春与无尽的生命，诱惑那些心智孱弱之人。你已经亲眼看到了它会带来的代价。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the object in your hands and shakes her head with concern.{/n} "Get rid of it, elantach. This creation is the fruit of ancient and twisted minds that tempt the weak with the promise of eternal youth and life unending. You have seen the price it exacts with your own eyes."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特看着你手里的东西，关切地摇了摇头。{/n}“快把它丢掉，外界人。这件造物的创造者是某种古老而扭曲的思想，它会以永恒的青春与无尽的生命，诱惑那些心智孱弱之人。你已经亲眼看到了它会带来的代价。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはあなたの手の中の装置を見て心配そうに頭を振る。{/n}「外せ、エランタ。これは古代の、弱者に永遠の若さと不滅の命を約束する捻れた精神の産物だ。それがどんな犠牲を強いるかは、お前も自身の目で見たはずだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the object in your hands and shakes her head with concern.{/n} "Get rid of it, elantach. This creation is the fruit of ancient and twisted minds that tempt the weak with the promise of eternal youth and life unending. You have seen the price it exacts with your own eyes."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはあなたの手の中の装置を見て心配そうに頭を振る。{/n}「外せ、エランタ。これは古代の、弱者に永遠の若さと不滅の命を約束する捻れた精神の産物だ。それがどんな犠牲を強いるかは、お前も自身の目で見たはずだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet regarde l'objet entre vos mains et secoue la tête d'un air inquiet.{/n} « Débarrassez-vous de ça, elantach. Cette création a été réalisée par d'anciens esprits pervertis, elle tente les faibles en leur promettant la jeunesse éternelle et une vie sans fin. Vous avez vu le prix qu'elle exige de vos propres yeux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the object in your hands and shakes her head with concern.{/n} "Get rid of it, elantach. This creation is the fruit of ancient and twisted minds that tempt the weak with the promise of eternal youth and life unending. You have seen the price it exacts with your own eyes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet regarde l'objet entre vos mains et secoue la tête d'un air inquiet.{/n} « Débarrassez-vous de ça, elantach. Cette création a été réalisée par d'anciens esprits pervertis, elle tente les faibles en leur promettant la jeunesse éternelle et une vie sans fin. Vous avez vu le prix qu'elle exige de vos propres yeux. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet observa el objeto que sostienes y sacude la cabeza preocupada.{/n} «Deshazte de él, elantach. Ese dispositivo ha sido creado por mentes antiguas y retorcidas que tientan a los débiles con la promesa de la eterna juventud y una vida sin fin. Ya has visto el precio que se cobra con tus propios ojos».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the object in your hands and shakes her head with concern.{/n} "Get rid of it, elantach. This creation is the fruit of ancient and twisted minds that tempt the weak with the promise of eternal youth and life unending. You have seen the price it exacts with your own eyes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet observa el objeto que sostienes y sacude la cabeza preocupada.{/n} «Deshazte de él, elantach. Ese dispositivo ha sido creado por mentes antiguas y retorcidas que tientan a los débiles con la promesa de la eterna juventud y una vida sin fin. Ya has visto el precio que se cobra con tus propios ojos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet betrachtet das Objekt in deiner Hand und schüttelt besorgt den Kopf.{/n} "Werdet es los, Elantach. Diese Schöpfung ist die Frucht alter und kranker Geister, die die Schwachen mit dem Versprechen ewiger Jugend und endlosen Lebens locken wollen. Den Preis dafür habt Ihr schon mit eigenen Augen gesehen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the object in your hands and shakes her head with concern.{/n} "Get rid of it, elantach. This creation is the fruit of ancient and twisted minds that tempt the weak with the promise of eternal youth and life unending. You have seen the price it exacts with your own eyes."

Diese Schöpfung ist die Frucht alter und kranker Geister, die die Schwachen mit dem Versprechen ewiger Jugend und endlosen Lebens locken wollen. Den Preis dafür habt Ihr schon mit eigenen Augen gesehen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, elindeki nesneye bakıp endişe içinde başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Kurtul şundan elantach. Bu icat, ebedî gençlik ve ölümsüz bir yaşam vaadiyle güçsüzleri cezbeden, kadim ve çarpık zihinlerin eseridir. Takandan aldığı bedeli kendi gözlerinle gördün."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at the object in your hands and shakes her head with concern.{/n} "Get rid of it, elantach. This creation is the fruit of ancient and twisted minds that tempt the weak with the promise of eternal youth and life unending. You have seen the price it exacts with your own eyes."
